faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FamilySpot

whatIs.question: What is FamilySpot and how does it help families?
whatIs.answer: FamilySpot is a collaborative platform where parents discover verified family-friendly places in their community. We create a trusted network of families sharing family restaurants, children's playgrounds, cafes with play areas, and kids' activities.

verification.question: How does family-friendly place verification work?
verification.answer: All family restaurants, children's playgrounds, and kids' places are evaluated by real parents from our community. We use a detailed review system that includes information about infrastructure, safety, accessibility, and suitability for different ages.

cost.question: Is it free to find family-friendly places?
cost.answer: Yes! FamilySpot is 100% free for all families. Our mission is to help parents find the best places for children at no cost. Access family restaurants, verified playgrounds, and children's activities completely free.

launch.question: When will FamilySpot be available?
launch.answer: We are finalizing the development of our family-friendly places platform. Sign up for our list to be one of the first to discover the best family restaurants and children's places when we're ready!

contribute.question: How can I recommend family-friendly places?
contribute.answer: After launch, you'll be able to add new family restaurants, review children's playgrounds you've visited, add photos of cafes with play areas, and share useful tips about kids' places with other families.

cities.question: In which cities will FamilySpot be available?
